climbs.name: Work From Home
climbs.fa: Matthew Santisi, Tatiana Santisi, Bradley Blackway 9/3/20

content.description: Scramble up to a hand crack.  Climb the hand crack until it is possible to step right and climb dual cracks to a ledge.  From the ledge find the hidden over hanging dihedral.  Climb the corner for 20 feet until it is possible to move left (crux) to a hanging block on the arete.  Finish the last 10 feet on the arete for exposed and fun climbing to a bolted anchor.
content.location: Just right of the black bowl and 10 left of Masks, Methanol, and Moonshine.  Much of the upper route is hidden by a tree.

climbs.name: Socially distant
climbs.fa: Brad Blackway, and John Mackey June 2020

content.description: Up the face and arete 6' left of the dihedral hand crack of Masks Methanol and Moonshine. Move up to a stance on the face, traverse left to gain the arete. Head up the arete to the shared anchor with MMM.
content.location: At the top of the block left of the big dihedral corner.

climbs.name: Masks, Methanol, and Moonshine
climbs.fa: Bradley Blackway, and John Mackey June 2020

content.description: Up the Beautiful handcrack to the fixed rap anchor.
content.protection: gear from .5 to #4 C4's with doubles in the .75- 3 range helpful.

climbs.name: Homeschooled
climbs.fa: Bradley Blackway, Allison Rooney, Sabrina Hague

content.description: Fun climbing up clean low angle rock. Up the flaring crack(crux) to its end. Gain the ledge for a second easier crux on micro cams. easier climbing to the fixed rap anchors.
content.protection: Gear to .5 C4 doubles in micro cams. Small nuts.
content.location: Up the obvious flaring crack 10' right of Masks Methanol and Moonshine.

content.description: a nice partly shaded cliff with a couple moderates and a handful of good lines.
